scripts.up: sudo ncu -u && sudo npm update --upgradeAll --save-dev && gulp
scripts.icheck: bower i -S iCheck && mv src/css/plugin/iCheck.styl.off src/css/plugin/iCheck.styl && mv src/js/plugin/iCheck.js.off src/js/plugin/iCheck.js && gulp
scripts.iCheck: bower i -S iCheck && mv src/css/plugin/iCheck.styl.off src/css/plugin/iCheck.styl && mv src/js/plugin/iCheck.js.off src/js/plugin/iCheck.js && gulp
scripts.slick: bower i -S slick-carousel && mv src/css/plugin/slick.styl.off src/css/plugin/slick.styl && mv src/js/plugin/slick.js.off src/js/plugin/slick.js && gulp

scripts.cookie: bower i -S js-cookie && mv src/css/plugin/cookie.styl.off src/css/plugin/cookie.styl && mv src/js/plugin/cookie.js.off src/js/plugin/cookie.js && gulp

scripts.raty: bower i -S raty && mv src/css/plugin/raty.styl.off src/css/plugin/raty.styl && mv src/js/plugin/raty.js.off src/js/plugin/raty.js && gulp
scripts.responsive: bower i -S jquery.resizeend && mv src/js/layout/responsive.js.off src/js/layout/responsive.js && gulp

scripts.countdown: bower i -S jquery.countdown && mv src/js/plugin/countdown.js.off src/js/plugin/countdown.js && gulp
scripts.fullpage: bower i -S fullpage.js && mv src/js/plugin/fullpage.js.off src/js/plugin/fullpage.js && gulp
scripts.prettyembed: bower i -S pretty-embed && mv src/js/plugin/pretty-embed.js.off src/js/plugin/pretty-embed.js && gulp
scripts.sticky: bower i -S jquery-throttle-debounce && mv src/css/plugin/sticky.styl.off src/css/plugin/sticky.styl && mv src/js/plugin/sticky.js.off src/js/plugin/sticky.js && gulp
scripts.snow: mv src/css/plugin/snow.styl.off src/css/plugin/snow.styl && mv src/js/plugin/snow.js.off src/js/plugin/snow.js && gulp
scripts.slider: bower i -S ionrangeslider && mv src/css/plugin/rangeSlider.styl.off src/css/plugin/rangeSlider.styl && mv src/js/plugin/rangeSlider.js.off src/js/plugin/rangeSlider.js && gulp
